original_solution_mapping.L1: She has 120 minutes to practice because 2 x 60 = <<2*60=120>>120
original_solution_mapping.L2: She has already spent 93 minutes on her work because 30 + 25 + 38 = <<30+25+38=93>>93

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2062.
    Returns: the time Joan has left to use the special finger exerciser.
    """
    # L1
    total_hours = 2 # 2 hours to get all her music practice done
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    total_minutes_available = total_hours * minutes_per_hour

    # L2
    piano_time = 30 # 30 minutes on the piano
    writing_music_time = 25 # 25 minutes writing music on her computer
    reading_history_time = 38 # 38 minutes reading about the history of the piano
    total_minutes_spent = piano_time + writing_music_time + reading_history_time

    # L3
    remaining_time = total_minutes_available - total_minutes_spent

    # FA
    answer = remaining_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: She has {total_minutes_available} minutes to practice because {total_hours} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes_available}>>{total_minutes_available}

She has already spent {total_minutes_spent} minutes on her work because {piano_time} + {writing_music_time} + {reading_history_time} = <<{piano_time}+{writing_music_time}+{reading_history_time}={total_minutes_spent}>>{total_minutes_spent}

She has {remaining_time} minutes to use on finger exercise because {total_minutes_available}-{total_minutes_spent} = <<{total_minutes_available}-{total_minutes_spent}={remaining_time}>>{remaining_time}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: She has 120 minutes to practice because 2 x 60 = <<2*60=120>>120
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: She has already spent 93 minutes on her work because 30 + 25 + 38 = <<30+25+38=93>>93

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'writing_music_time' (value: 25) was used instead of 'total_minutes_spent' (value: 93).
